t: How to Merge ASINs on Amazon: Step-by-Step Seller Guide
s: March 17, 2023 - Summary: To merge ASINs on Amazon, log in to Seller Central and go to Manage All Inventory. Locate the target ASIN, click the three dots, and select Merge duplicate product. Enter the source ASIN (the one you want to merge), provide a reason, and submit the request.
